pr_title: show floppy symbol instead of text offline in cache lists

timeline.bodyText:
Just an unqualified question looking at the comment:
What about a NULL case?
timeline.author: Lineflyer

replies.bodyText: Ah, I simply erased the condition and always returned true for testing purposes. When could a null value happen - no list assigned? Is this a possible use case? (Search by address from mainscreen, maybe?)
replies.author: moving-bits

replies.bodyText:
Search by address from mainscreen, maybe?

Yes, maybe all the list generated from on demand like search results or lists of live map caches. But I am not deep enough into the code to judge....just guessing, why sometime in the past someone added this comment.
replies.author: Lineflyer
